title: RabbitMQ Webhook
description: An open-source message broker that implements the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP).

events.name: connection.established
events.description: Fired when a connection is established to RabbitMQ.

events.name: connection.failed
events.description: Fired when a connection to RabbitMQ fails.

events.name: connection.disconnected
events.description: Fired when a connection to RabbitMQ is disconnected.

events.name: consumer.connection.established
events.description: Fired when a connection is established to the consumer.

events.name: consumer.connection.failed
events.description: Fired when a connection to the consumer fails.

events.name: queue.connection.established
events.description: Fired when a connection is established to the queue.

events.name: queue.connection.failed
events.description: Fired when a connection to the queue fails.

events.name: message.received
events.description: Fired when a message is received.
